actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Mojave National Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Mojave National Park, California, to preserve the scenic, historic, recreational, natural, and archeological features of the Eastern Mojave Desert. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to revise the park's boundaries, up to a size of 1,500,000 acres. Authorizes appropriations necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Mojave National Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.
